context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a taxi, Uber or any other ride service to quickly get him to the airport
call for roadside assistance or a taxi/rideshare service like Uber or Lyft to get him to the airport quickly
call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-sharing service or arrange for a friend or relative to come and pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi or use a ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport as quickly as possible
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other available immediate transportation service
contact a taxi service, ride share app like Uber or Lyft, or roadside assistance to either get his car fixed quickly or get a ride to the airport
call a tow truck for his car and a taxi or rideshare service like Uber or Lyft to get him to the airport quickly
call for a taxi, Uber, or other kind of ride service quickly to ensure he has alternate transportation to the airport
call for roadside assistance or a taxi to ensure he gets to the airport on time
call a taxi or an Uber/Lyft to transport him immediately to the airport while also arranging for a towing service to take care of his broken down car

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: retrace his steps and actions throughout the evening to see if there was any point at which he might have made a mistake in handling cash or giving change
contact his supervisor immediately to report the missing money and ask for advice on how to proceed
check the surveillance video if available to see if there was any theft or errors in cash handling
double-check all the receipts and transactions made during his shift
carefully recount the money in the register and check the day's transaction receipts to see if a mistake was made in processing or giving change
immediately report the missing money to his supervisor or boss
notify his supervisor immediately about the discrepancy
carefully count and recount the money in the register to make sure he hasn't made a mistake
carefully recount the cash in the register to double-check whether any mistakes were made
thoroughly review the receipts, sales transactions, or surveillance footage if any, to find out if there was any mistake or theft involved

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: stay put and not venture further
stay calm and try to construct a makeshift shelter to keep warm and well-rested
start rationing the remaining food and water

stay where they are and try to signal for rescue
create a shelter first to protect them from the extreme cold

try to find a way to signal for help, such as using a bright cloth or flashlights
stay put and create a visible signal to attract attention of possible rescuers
